pullRequest.title: Javadoc updates
pullRequest.bodyText: Just for review before merging - some docs were missing, incorrect, leaked implementation detail or incorrectly formatted.

nodes.bodyText: Missing A value of one indicates the platform default. (copied from the method below)

commit.message:
Add requiringPermissionWeak to GenericArguments

* Also don't put [] around usage text that is empty when wrapping element in "optional" or "optionalWeak"

See #2083
Update Explosion and sound event javadocs
